description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base with sample CV documents, sets up a vector database, and performs a filtered query using an agent. It demonstrates document ingestion, metadata attachment, and querying within a knowledge management system.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to perform queries and generate responses.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF documents, supporting metadata and vector storage.

classes.name: ChromaDb
classes.description: A class representing a vector database for storing and querying document embeddings.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for testing and populates a list with their paths.
